content: are picture 18 feet position indicating the upper part of the foot see pictures 18 to 20 for the guide 4 sew the tail over rounds 21 and 24 on the center back of the body pictures 20 and 21 stuff the tail lightly before you finish sewing it 5 sew the accessories anywhere you like you may add a little stuffing into the hat before sewing it to the bunny 6 your mini easter egg bunny is ready picture 19 feet position picture 22 your mini easter egg picture 20 foot and picture 21 tail position bunny is ready tail position © 2024 audrey lilian mini easter egg bunny page 6 congratulations you have made mini easter egg bunny you can make as many as you like and play with the decorations thank you for making mini easter egg bunny ^_^ please don t forget to tag me @audrey__lc and use hashtag #minieastereggbunny when you post your easter egg bunny on instagram © 2024 audrey lilian mini easter egg bunny page 7
